trans-unit.source: Specifies with an underscore the character that is used as the access key.
trans-unit.target: 指定以下划线字符，用作访问密钥。

trans-unit.source: If your content has multiple underscore characters, only the first one is converted into an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>; the other underscores appear as normal text.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容中有多个下划线字符，只有第一个将转换为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>; 其他下划线显示为普通文本。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underscore that you want converted to the access key is not the first underscore, use two consecutive underscores for any underscores that precede the one that you want to convert.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想转换的访问密钥为下划线不是第一个下划线，使用两个连续的下划线的任何下划线之前你想要转换的一个。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code contains an access key and displays as _Hello**W**orld: ``` <AccessText>__Hello_World</AccessText> ``` Because the underscore that precedes H is a double, the W key registers as the access key.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的代码包含访问密钥，并将显示为 _Hello**W**orld: ``` <AccessText>__Hello_World</AccessText> ``` W 键 H 前面下划线是双精度，因为注册为访问键。

trans-unit.source: To use AccessText as a content host in a control style, set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.RecognizesAccessKey%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, as this example shows: ``` <ContentPresenter RecognizesAccessKey="True"/> ```
trans-unit.target: 若要将用作在控件样式中的内容主机 AccessText，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.RecognizesAccessKey%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>，如下例所示︰ ``` <ContentPresenter RecognizesAccessKey="True"/> ``` </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.RecognizesAccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Provides read-only access to the character that follows the first underline character.
trans-unit.target: 提供对后面的第一个下划线字符的字符的只读访问。

trans-unit.source: Use the AccessKey property to programmatically determine which character is parsed by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AccessKey 属性以编程方式确定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>分析哪一个字符

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> registers the AccessKey character and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> event when users press the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>注册 AccessKey 字符并引发<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>事件时用户按下键。</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>

trans-unit.source: The character to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的字符。

trans-unit.source: Arranges and sizes the content of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 排列和调整大小的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The computed size that is used to arrange the content.
trans-unit.target: 用于排列内容计算出的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the content.
trans-unit.target: 内容的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that fills the content area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> ，它填充内容的区域。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that fills the content area.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> ，它填充内容的区域。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.Background*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.Background*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that adjusts the baseline offset position of text in an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，调整基线偏移位置中的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], this value is a true double.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，此值为 true double。

trans-unit.source: You cannot qualify this value by using measurement units such as picas or points.
trans-unit.target: 您不能通过使用度量单位，例如派卡或点来限定此值。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The amount to adjust the baseline offset position.
trans-unit.target: 要调整基线的量偏移位置。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.BaselineOffset*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.BaselineOffset*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The font family to use.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: The default is the font that is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily*> metric.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是由确定的字体<xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily*>指标。</xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontFamily*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontFamily*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontFamily*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font size to use with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的字体大小<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *Double* A string representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|， ， | # # XAML 属性用法``` - or – ``` # # XAML 值*Double* 的字符串表示形式值。

trans-unit.source: This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 此值解释为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a value of `1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定的值`1`。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*值，后跟这些单元声明字符串之一︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **Note** In many cases, you can set a double to `Auto`; however, you cannot set this property to `Auto`.
trans-unit.target: `px`（默认值） 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`in`为英寸; 1 英寸 = = 96px`cm`是厘米; 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`是点; 1pt==(96/72) px**注意**在许多情况下，你可以将一个双精度值设置为`Auto`; 但是，不能将此属性设置为`Auto`。

trans-unit.source: The font size to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is the font size that is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize*> metric.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是由确定的字体大小<xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize*>指标。</xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontSize*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontSize*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>属性选择一个正常的、 压缩或扩展从字体<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The relative degree that the font is stretched.
trans-unit.target: 字体比拉伸的相对程度。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal*>。</xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal*>

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontStretch*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontStretch*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的字体样式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information and a list of font styles, see <xref:System.Windows.FontStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息和字体样式的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.FontStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.FontStyle>

trans-unit.target: 要使用; 的字体样式例如，普通、 斜体或倾斜。

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle*> metric.
trans-unit.target: 默认值由<xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle*>指标。</xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontStyle*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的字体粗细<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The font weight to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight*> metric.
trans-unit.target: 默认值由<xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight*>指标。</xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontWeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontWeight*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontWeight*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that draws the text.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref>用于绘制文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Black*>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Black*>

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.Foreground*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.Foreground*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of a visual child element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可视子元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the visual child element to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的可视子元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer that represents the index of a visual child element.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个整数，表示可视子元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of each line box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置每个行框的高度。

trans-unit.source: Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; instead, it changes the box that contains it.
trans-unit.target: 更改此值不会更改关联的文本; 的高度相反，它会更改包含它的框。

trans-unit.source: To change the size of the text, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的文本大小，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* A string representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|， ， | # # XAML 属性用法``` - or – - or – ``` # # XAML 值*double* 的字符串表示形式值。

trans-unit.source: This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 此值解释为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a value of `1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定的值`1`。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply here.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>属性值部分中所述的范围限制在此处适用。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*值，后跟这些单元声明字符串之一︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px *Auto* An automatic line height determination.
trans-unit.target: `px`（默认值） 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`in`为英寸; 1 英寸 = = 96px`cm`是厘米; 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`是点; 1pt==(96/72) px*自动*自动确定行高。

trans-unit.source: If you programmatically set the *Auto* value, its value corresponds to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果以编程方式设置*自动*值，其值对应于<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A double that specifies the height of each line box.
trans-unit.target: 双精度值，指定每个行框的高度。

trans-unit.source: This value must be equal to or greater than `0.0034` and equal to or less then `160000`.
trans-unit.target: 此值必须等于或大于`0.0034`且等于或小于`160000`。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> (equivalent to an attribute value of `Auto`) causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> (等效于特性值的`Auto`) 使行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight*> property is enforced.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight*>属性强制执行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> properties control the line box that is reserved for text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>属性控制留待文本与行框。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> allows users to set a suggestion of height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>允许用户设置的建议高度。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy> defines how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> is enforced.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>定义如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>强制执行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>

trans-unit.source: You can set the LineStackingStrategy property to <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy> or <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将 LineStackingStrategy 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>或<xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>。</xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy> </xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy> value increases the line to the tallest object in the line.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>值会增加到最高的对象在行中的行。</xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>

trans-unit.source: It ensures that no item overdraws or is trimmed.
trans-unit.target: 它确保没有项拉伸过度或修整。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy> value enforces a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> value on all lines.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>值强制执行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>上所有行值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> property does not provide sufficient space, the text is either overdrawn or trimmed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>属性未提供足够的空间，拉伸过度或修整文本。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: Which occurs depends on the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipProperty> value.
trans-unit.target: 出现这种情况取决于<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipProperty>值。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipProperty>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy"></xref> value that determines the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy"> </xref>值，该值确定的行为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight*>

trans-unit.target: 一个枚举器循环访问此元素的逻辑子元素。

trans-unit.source: Remeasures the control.
trans-unit.target: 重新测量控件。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size limit for the control.
trans-unit.target: 该控件的最大大小限制。

trans-unit.source: The return value cannot exceed this size.
trans-unit.target: 返回值不能超过此大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Cannot exceed the maximum size limit for the control.
trans-unit.target: 不能超过控件的最大大小限制。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: An access key is not created if you use the Text property to supply text for an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> element.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用文本属性来提供文本，不会创建一个访问密钥<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: This property is used internally to determine the text that is displayed by the access key.
trans-unit.target: 此属性在内部用于确定访问密钥的显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to set additional text that does not contain the mnemonic (underlined character) or to retrieve the access key text.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置不包含助记键 （带下划线的字符） 的附加文本或以检索访问密钥文本，可以使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *_accessText* A string that contains the underscore character.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 对象元素用法``` - or - ``` # # XAML 值*_accessText*包含下划线字符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This value becomes an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> that handles access keys for the *object*.
trans-unit.target: 此值将成为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>句柄访问密钥*对象*。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The access key is the character that immediately follows the underscore.
trans-unit.target: 访问键是紧随下划线的字符。

trans-unit.source: *accessTextObject* The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>.
trans-unit.target: *accessTextObject* <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: The text without the first underscore character.
trans-unit.target: 不带第一个下划线字符文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置内容的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: For a list of alignments see <xref:System.Windows.TextAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: 有关对齐方式的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.TextAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.TextAlignment>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment of the text.
trans-unit.target: 文本的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.TextAlignment*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.TextAlignment*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.TextAlignment*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the decorations that are added to the text of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置添加到的文本的修饰<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about text decorations, see <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorations>.
trans-unit.target: 文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorations>。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecorations>

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically set, either by using markup or code.
trans-unit.target: 通常不设置此属性，通过使用标记或代码。

trans-unit.source: This property exposes the default decoration for an access key (an underline in the same text color as the text) for possible styling or programmatic change.
trans-unit.target: 此属性公开的访问密钥 （在相同的文本颜色的文本中的下划线） 的默认修饰可能样式，或以编程方式更改。

trans-unit.source: Because users expect access key identifiers to have a certain appearance in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], a better choice is to change this property by using application-wide mechanisms, such as application styles or custom themes.
trans-unit.target: 由于用户希望访问密钥标识符具有某种外观[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，更好的选择是通过使用应用程序范围的机制，如应用程序样式或自定义主题更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *OneOrMoreTextDecorations* One or more elements.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*OneOrMoreTextDecorations*一个或多个元素。

trans-unit.source: Use this syntax if you are defining custom text decorations.
trans-unit.target: 如果要定义自定义文本修饰，请使用此语法。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 创建文本效果](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorations"> </xref>应用于文本<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置添加到的文本效果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically set, either by using markup or code.
trans-unit.target: 通常不设置此属性，通过使用标记或代码。

trans-unit.source: This property exposes the default effects for an access key for possible styling or programmatic change.
trans-unit.target: 此属性公开的默认效果以可能的样式设置，或以编程方式更改的访问密钥。

trans-unit.source: Because users expect access key identifiers to have a certain appearance in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], a better choice is to change this property by using application-wide mechanisms, such as application styles or custom themes.
trans-unit.target: 由于用户希望访问密钥标识符具有某种外观[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，更好的选择是通过使用应用程序范围的机制，如应用程序样式或自定义主题更改此属性。
